data.title: Parc Residenses
data.description: Kumar Prospera Project has 2 &3 BHK flats in Magarpatta, Hadapsar. It is a new Residential construction in Pune. The project is nestled amongst reputed EON & Magarpatta IT Parks, world-class Amanora & Seasons malls. The project offers flats for sale in Hadapsar. Though set in the hub of activities, Kumar Prospera fulfils the much-awaited supply of residential dwellings in the area around Magarpatta, Mundhwa,  Keshav Nagar and Kharadi with in-house modern amenities in combination with schools, workplace and malls in the vicinity. Thus providing a high quality of life. The developer Kumar Properties has been the hallmark of trust and excellence for more than five decades, has the impeccable quality record, and known for thoughtful design coupled with rich experience to create a masterpiece in luxury residences.

tech_stack.title: Modern Technology – Superstructure, points: []
tech_stack.description: Kumar Prospera is amongst the best upcoming projects in Pune using modern technology construction for Superstructure called the Alu-Form system wherein walls and slabs for a typical floor get cast at one time (monolithic construction). The use of aluminium formwork gives better dimensional tolerance eliminating chances of warpage/bulging. Due to this system, external walls have better weather-resistant properties, and issues related to external paint damage and water leakages are practically eliminated. Alu-Form construction also speeds up construction at the site without compromising on the quality.

bulleting.title: Club House
points: Gymnasium
Multipurpose Hall
Swimming Pool with Kids Pool and Pool Deck Area
Table Tennis
Indoor Games Room
Swimming Pool Change Rooms.

bulleting.title: Outdoor Party Lawn Area along with pantry and open-air Food court.
Outdoor Children play area along with a toddler play area.
Sewage Treatment Plant and Water Treatment Plant.
Construction
points: A-class, earthquake-resistant construction.

bulleting.title: Flooring
points: Vitrified tiles in living, kitchen and bedrooms, Matt finished Ceramic Tile flooring in toilets, Anti-skid tiles for balconies/terraces.

bulleting.title: Doors
points: Vinyl finished flush door with SS fittings for Entrance Door, HDF Skin moulded flush doors with SS fittings for bedrooms and toilets.

bulleting.title: Walls And Ceiling
points: Gypsum punning on walls, Superior OBD Paint for walls and ceilings.

bulleting.title: Windows
points: Powder Coated Aluminum Sliding Windows with MS Grills.

bulleting.title: Railings for attached Terraces
points: Combination of MS / SS / Glass Railing for attached terraces.

bulleting.title: Kitchen
points: Granite kitchen counter, Stainless steel sink, Glazed tile dado up to Window Height, Power plug point for Water Purifier and Electric point for Exhaust Fan.

bulleting.title: Plumbing, Bathroom and Toilets
points: Concealed plumbing, Ceramic sanitary ware of reputed brand, Single lever diverter in shower areas along with single lever basin mixer for master toilet, 7′ height toilet dado with ceramic tiles.

bulleting.title: Electricals
points: Concealed copper wiring in the entire flat with ELCB and MCB, Modular electrical switch and sockets, Electric supply by way of 1 Phase / 3 Phase meter, Adequate points for lights, fans and TV, Telephone point in living and bedrooms, Power Plug point for split AC in Living Room and Master Bedroom.

bulleting.title: Entrance Lobby
points: Designer finish entrance lobby.

bulleting.title: Lifts
points: Modern, automatic lifts of reputed make.

bulleting.title: External Finish
points: Exterior grade texture Paint.

bulleting.title: Safety
points: Intercom Facility, Access control main entrance lobby at ground floor with CCTV camera.

points: Vinyl finished flush door with SS fittings for Entrance Door, HDF Skin moulded flush doors with SS fittings for bedrooms and toilets.

bulleting.title: Walls And Ceiling
points: Gypsum punning on walls, Superior OBD Paint for walls and ceilings.

bulleting.title: Windows
points: Powder Coated Aluminum Sliding Windows with MS Grills.

bulleting.title: Railings for attached Terraces
points: Combination of MS / SS / Glass Railing for attached terraces.

bulleting.title: Kitchen
points: Granite kitchen counter, Stainless steel sink, Glazed tile dado up to Window Height, Power plug point for Water Purifier and Electric point for Exhaust Fan.

bulleting.title: Plumbing, Bathroom and Toilets
points: Concealed plumbing, Ceramic sanitary ware of reputed brand, Single lever diverter in shower areas along with single lever basin mixer for master toilet, 7′ height toilet dado with ceramic tiles.

bulleting.title: Electricals
points: Concealed copper wiring in the entire flat with ELCB and MCB, Modular electrical switch and sockets, Electric supply by way of 1 Phase / 3 Phase meter, Adequate points for lights, fans and TV, Telephone point in living and bedrooms, Power Plug point for split AC in Living Room and Master Bedroom.

bulleting.title: Entrance Lobby
points: Designer finish entrance lobby.

bulleting.title: Lifts
points: Modern, automatic lifts of reputed make.

bulleting.title: External Finish
points: Exterior grade texture Paint.

bulleting.title: Safety
points: Intercom Facility, Access control main entrance lobby at ground floor with CCTV camera.

data.title: Kumar Infinia Park
data.description: Kumar Prospera Project has 2 &3 BHK flats in Magarpatta, Hadapsar. It is a new Residential construction in Pune. The project is nestled amongst reputed EON & Magarpatta IT Parks, world-class Amanora & Seasons malls. The project offers flats for sale in Hadapsar. Though set in the hub of activities, Kumar Prospera fulfils the much-awaited supply of residential dwellings in the area around Magarpatta, Mundhwa,  Keshav Nagar and Kharadi with in-house modern amenities in combination with schools, workplace and malls in the vicinity. Thus providing a high quality of life. The developer Kumar Properties has been the hallmark of trust and excellence for more than five decades, has the impeccable quality record, and known for thoughtful design coupled with rich experience to create a masterpiece in luxury residences.

tech_stack.title: Modern Technology – Superstructure, points: []
tech_stack.description: Kumar Prospera is amongst the best upcoming projects in Pune using modern technology construction for Superstructure called the Alu-Form system wherein walls and slabs for a typical floor get cast at one time (monolithic construction). The use of aluminium formwork gives better dimensional tolerance eliminating chances of warpage/bulging. Due to this system, external walls have better weather-resistant properties, and issues related to external paint damage and water leakages are practically eliminated. Alu-Form construction also speeds up construction at the site without compromising on the quality.

bulleting.title: Club House
points: Gymnasium
Multipurpose Hall
Swimming Pool with Kids Pool and Pool Deck Area
Table Tennis
Indoor Games Room
Swimming Pool Change Rooms.

bulleting.title: Outdoor Party Lawn Area along with pantry and open-air Food court.
Outdoor Children play area along with a toddler play area.
Sewage Treatment Plant and Water Treatment Plant.
Construction
points: A-class, earthquake-resistant construction.
